item.title: Basic Usage of R Language
item.description: Installation R download from official website -> click here choose the mirror to download according your location and OS RStudio ensure that you have installed R before installing RSudio download RStudio desktop from official website -> click here Notebook can use RStudio also can use Kaggle Basic Functions and Usage of R Language practice in Kaggle
